anand.name: Anand Chakroborty
anand.comment: Kamfanin Injiniyan Powerton ya sanya aikin amfani da makamashin rana ya zama mai sauƙi da kuma sauƙi. Ƙungiyarsu ta ɗauki kula da komai daga farko zuwa ƙarshe, kuma muna jin daɗi sosai da sakamakon.

sanjay.name: Sanjay Shukla
sanjay.comment: Na yi farin ciki da zaɓar Kamfanin Injiniyan Powerton don shigarwar mu, kuma ba zan dadin yin wa kowane ɗan uwana shawara ba.

rhea.name: Rhea Sharma
rhea.comment: Samfuran inganci na musamman da sabis na abokan ciniki na musamman. Ƙwarewar fasaha ta ƙungiyar tana da ban sha'awa kuma tana da ƙwarewa sosai.

priya.name: Priya Patil
priya.comment: Yin aiki tare da Kamfanin Injiniyan Powerton ya kasance gogewa mai ban mamaki. Hanyoyin sarrafa su ta atomatik sun canza tsarin samarwa mu kuma sun inganta inganci da kashi talatin da biyar. An ba da shawarar sosai don ayyukan sarrafa masana'antu ta atomatik.

kavya.name: Kavya Singh
kavya.comment: Sabis na musamman da tallafin fasaha! Ƙungiyar ta ba da jagora na musamman yayin aiwatar da aikinmu na rana. Hanyarsu ta sana'a da isar da lokaci sun wuce tsammaninmu gaba ɗaya.

rajesh.name: Rajesh Iyer
rajesh.comment: Kamfanin Injiniyan Powerton ta kai daidai abin da suka yi alkawari. Tsarin kayan aikin auna da suka shigar ya kasance yana aiki da kyau sama da shekaru biyu. Tallafin su bayan sayar da kyan gani ne kuma ko da yaushe suna amsa.

technicalTerms.IEEE: IEEE (Kungiyar Injiniyoyin Lantarki da Na'urorin Lantarki)

company.name: Powerton Engineering Pvt. Ltd.
company.tagline: Abokin hulɗarku na aminci a cikin sarrafa masana'antu da injiniyan lantarki

address.full: Bene na biyu, F-25, Ginin F, Yanki 6, Noida, Uttar Pradesh 201301, Indiya

seo.servicePageTitle: {{service}} Ayyuka | Sarrafa Masana'antu ta Atomatik & Tsarin Sarrafawa | Powerton Engineering Indiya
seo.servicePageDescription: Ƙwararrun ayyukan {{service}} don ayyukan sarrafa masana'antu ta atomatik a faɗin Indiya. {{description}}. Kamfanin da aka tabbatar da ISO tare da ƙwarewar shekaru 15+ a fannin injiniyan lantarki, tsarin PLC SCADA DCS, ƙera kwamitin sarrafawa, da sarrafa ayyuka ta atomatik. Yin hidima ga masana'antun harhada magunguna, tashoshin wutar lantarki, mai & gas, masana'antu. Ƙwararre a cikin Siemens, Allen Bradley, Schneider, ABB automation. Tallafi 24/7 | Shawarwari kyauta | Kasuwanci a duk faɗin Indiya
seo.servicePageKeywords: {{service}} ayyuka Indiya, {{service}} sarrafa kansa, masana'antu {{service}}, {{service}} injiniya, {{service}} mafita, {{service}} kamfanoni Indiya, masu ba da {{service}}, ƙwararrun {{service}}, masu ba da shawara na {{service}}, ayyukan sarrafa masana'antu ta atomatik, ayyukan injiniyan lantarki, ayyukan sarrafa kansa Indiya, ayyukan tsarin sarrafawa, ayyukan shirye-shiryen PLC, ayyukan haɗin SCADA, ayyukan injiniyan DCS, ayyukan kayan aiki Indiya

powerton.name: Powerton Engineering Pvt. Ltd.
powerton.description: ISO 9001:2015 kamfanin sarrafa masana'antu ta atomatik da ƙera kwamitin sarrafa lantarki da aka tabbatar yana hidima ga harhada magunguna, tashar wutar lantarki, mai & gas, sinadarai, masana'antu, sarrafa ruwa, da masana'antun makamashi mai sabuntawa a duk faɗin Indiya da duniya. Babban mai haɗa tsarin sarrafa kansa tare da ƙwarewar shekaru 15+ a cikin tsarin PLC SCADA DCS, kayan aiki, sarrafa ayyuka ta atomatik, da ayyukan masana'antu masu mahimmanci. Mai ba da mafita na injiniya mai lambar yabo tare da shigarwa 1200+ masu nasara. Ƙwararre a cikin Siemens, Allen Bradley, Schneider, Honeywell, ABB, fasahohin sarrafa kansa na Rockwell.
powerton.keywords: Kamfanonin Sarrafa Masana'antu ta Atomatik Indiya, Mai Ƙera Kwamitin Sarrafa Lantarki, Masu Gina Kwamitin Sarrafawa, Ayyukan Shirye-shiryen PLC, Haɗin Tsarin SCADA, Injiniyan DCS, Sarrafa Ayyuka ta Atomatik Indiya, Tsarin Sarrafa Masana'antu, Ayyukan Injiniyan Sarrafa Kansa, Haɓaka HMI, Zane Kwamitin Sarrafawa, Sarrafa Masana'antu, Sarrafa Shuka, Sarrafa Masana'antu, IoT na Masana'antu Indiya, Magani na Masana'antu 4.0, Ƙera Mai Hankali, Sarrafa Magunguna, Sarrafa Tashar Wutar Lantarki, Sarrafa Mai da Gas, Sarrafa Shuka na Sinadarai, SCADA na Sarrafa Ruwa, Sarrafa Abinci, Sarrafa Shuka na Siminti, Cibiyar Sarrafa Mota MCC, Cibiyar Sarrafa Wutar Lantarki PCC, Kwamitin VFD, Masu Ƙera Kwamitin Lantarki Noida, Kamfanonin Sarrafa Kansa Noida, Mai Haɗa Tsarin Sarrafawa, Ayyukan Kayan Aiki, Magani na EPC na Rana, Sarrafa Makamashi Mai Sabuntawa, Tsarin Gudanar da Makamashi, Sarrafa Gini, Sarrafa HVAC, Tattalin Arziki Mai Fa'ida, Tsarin Kula da Nesa, Gyaran PLC, Hijira SCADA, Shawarwari na Sarrafa Kansa, Kwamitin Sarrafawa da UL ta Lissafa, Kwamitin da NEMA ta Ƙima, Kwamitin da IEC ta Amince da Su, Cibiyar Horar da Sarrafa Kansa, Magani na Lantarki na Masana'antu, Ayyukan Sarrafa Kansa Masu Mahimmanci, Ƙera Kwamitin Sarrafawa, Ayyukan Zane na Lantarki, Gudanar da Ayyukan Sarrafa Kansa
powerton.author: Ƙungiyar Injiniyan Powerton

seo.companyDescription: Babban kamfanin sarrafa masana'antu ta atomatik da injiniyan lantarki yana hidima ga abokan ciniki a duniya. Ƙwarewa a cikin sarrafa tashar wutar lantarki, shigarwar hasken rana, da tsarin sarrafa masana'antu.

thermal-plant.title: Sarrafa Tashar Wutar Lantarki ta Thermal
thermal-plant.description: Cikakken mafita na sarrafa kansa don tashar wutar lantarki mai karfin 250MW ciki har da kwamitocin sarrafawa, tsarin SCADA, da makullan tsaro.

pharma-plant.title: Tsarin Sarrafa Masana'antar Magunguna
pharma-plant.description: Babban tsarin sarrafa tsari da sa ido don masana'antar magunguna tare da bin ka'idojin FDA da fasalulluka na amincin bayanai.

solar-plant.title: Shigar da Wutar Lantarki ta Rana 10MW
solar-plant.description: Cikakken zane da shigar da tashar wutar lantarki ta rana da aka haɗa da grid tare da tsarin sa ido da kayan aikin aiki tare na grid.

water-treatment.title: Sarrafa Maganin Ruwa na Birni
water-treatment.description: Tsarin sarrafa kansa don masana'antar sarrafa ruwa da ke hidimtawa mazauna 500,000 tare da sa ido na ainihi da sarrafa inganci.

industrial-automation-demo.title: Demo: Tsarin Sarrafa Masana'antu
industrial-automation-demo.client: Abokin Ciniki na Masana'antu na gaba
industrial-automation-demo.description: Nuna cikakkun damar sarrafa masana'antu ciki har da haɗin PLC, tsarin SCADA, da mafita na sa ido na ainihi.

power-distribution-demo.title: Misali: Sarrafa Rarraba Wutar Lantarki
power-distribution-demo.client: Abokin Hulɗa na Wutar Lantarki na gaba
power-distribution-demo.description: Misalin tsarin rarraba wutar lantarki da ke nuna daidaita nauyi ta atomatik da damar sa ido daga nesa don wuraren samar da wutar lantarki.
